${ModID}:BuggyBash.NAME: Buggy Bash
${ModID}:BuggyBash.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Infest. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Deals !M! additional damage for each infestation counter.

${ModID}:SwarmSword.NAME: Swarm Sword
${ModID}:SwarmSword.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Infest. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Draw 1 card for each infestation counter.

${ModID}:GrassHop.NAME: Swarm Surge
${ModID}:GrassHop.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Infest. NL Gain !B! Block. NL When this gains an infestation counter, ALL enemies lose !M! HP.

${ModID}:BugOut.NAME: Bug Out
${ModID}:BugOut.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Infest. NL Gain 1 Strength and Dexterity for each infestation counter.

${ModID}:ScarabShield.NAME: Scarab Shield
${ModID}:ScarabShield.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Infest. NL Gain !B! Block. NL If this has 2 or more infestation counters, gain !M! Artifact.

${ModID}:Entomology.NAME: Entomology
${ModID}:Entomology.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Infest. NL Deal !D! damage. NL If this has any infestation counters, remove one and gain [E] .

${ModID}:Compoundeyes.NAME: Compoundeyes
${ModID}:Compoundeyes.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL When you next play a card, end your turn.

${ModID}:Bees.NAME: BEES!!!
${ModID}:Bees.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Infest. NL Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL Deals 1 additional damage for each infestation counter.

${ModID}:LordOfTheFlies.NAME: Lord of the Flies
${ModID}:LordOfTheFlies.DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 additional card each turn. NL When your cards ${ModID}:Infest, put an additional counter on them.
